title: the client loads, but the game doesnt launch
body:
so after repairing my computer to a previous date, league broke even after it repaired. 
I can load into the client, but whenever its time to launch the game, nothing actually launches. no other window even opens, and nothing comes after hitting reconnect. SOS 
any advice is appreciated

replies.body: After restoring your computer to a previous date, some of those game files are probably outdated and the client is getting confused about which patch it's on. I'd try running a repair through the client options, which you can find by clicking on the gear icon in the upper right-hand corner. That will make sure all the files are working they way they're meant to, but hit me back up if that doesn't help!
